data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Indre-et-Loire, Centre-Val de Loire, France to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Indre-et-Loire, Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 7,413 believers in Indre-et-Loire, Centre-Val de Loire, France a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Indre-et-Loire.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Indre-et-Loire, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Saint-Pierre-des-Corps
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Saint-Pierre-des-Corps, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Indre-et-Loire, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 7,413 believers in Indre-et-Loire and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the county of Indre-et-Loire, Centre-Val de Loire, France has a population of 603,300.

We estimate Indre-et-Loire has 7,413 people who might know Jesus, 368,930 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 226,957 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 7,413 believers in Indre-et-Loire to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
